website_summaries.verdict: Soft chews that are formulated with natural ingredients that help ease nasal allergy symptoms.
pros: Made with natural ingredients like hemp, Butterbur extract, and curcumin that target seasonal allergies and promote healthy digestion
Also contains omega fatty acids that soothe skin
Some dog owners report that this medication calms their pets' need to scratch
cons: Not all dogs like them, but many enjoy the flavor
May initially cause stomach upset that improves once dogs adjust to taking them

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: We tried the other allergy product by the same company (in the orange tub) and these didn't have any noticeable effect. Over the counter allergy meds also didn't make any difference, and as much as I didn't like the idea, we were considering immune suppressing injections. I'm glad we gave these a try! Within 10 days our dog's seasonal allergies were 95% better and we were able to take off his cone and pajamas. He is basically back to normal and so much happier!
customer_reviews.author: S. Pommier

customer_reviews.title: They love them and I love that they work
customer_reviews.text: My two Pitbulls have skin issues as all pitbulls do and my boxer/retriever mix has seasonal allergies. So these are great, they love them, they are made from ingredients I can pronounce and I know I'm not pumping my dogs full of chemicals. We've been zesty paw fans for a few years now! Plus they think they are getting treat which is way easier then trying to get them to eat something with a big pill hidden in it. They are way to smart for that.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Brackney

customer_reviews.title: Supplement that dog thinks is treat- helps with allergies!
customer_reviews.text: I admit, that we love Zesty paws supplements in our house. It makes giving them to the pups so much easier as they think they are treats! Our bully has seasonal allergies, so much that he will get hives from excess tree pollen. During tree season he needs to take Benidryl, however this supplement for the rest of the year keeps him in check. He even missed a few days when we boarded him and started getting hives again. 1 benydryl followed by this daily has kept him hive free and not scratching!
customer_reviews.author: spacecat

customer_reviews.title: Great. Inexpensive. No more skin issues.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as an alternative to Apoquel for my dogs. My oldest dog, 7 yrs, would get explosive diarrhea from the Apoquel. These helped her skin tremendously. She was no longer itchy and red after 4 days. Since she was no longer bothering herself he hair started growing back on all the bald spots she created from excessive itching. Glad I tried these and will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to have helped
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my schnoodle who was suffering from horrendous itchy skin. His armpits were raw! We were using another version of Zesty Paws, and they worked for a over a year. This version seems to be helping (along with a special shampoo). My dog looks for us to give him his vita-treat each morning and seems to like the flavor a lot.
customer_reviews.author: MichR

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Allergy Immune Bites
customer_reviews.text: My American Bulldog/Pit mix has bad allergy issues, as soon as I started giving her These allergy immune bites her bumps and paw rashes started to go away. I know it made her uncomfortable so I’m glad it cleared up and made her more comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Tasha Elflein

customer_reviews.title: Great product for our dog's allergies
customer_reviews.text: We started giving these allergy bites to our rescued 3 year old pit mix in May 2019. When we first fostered/rescued her in April 2019, she was itchy all the time. Changing her food to a limited ingredient diet did not stop her intense itching so we ordered this product. These bites have really helped with her itching. Now she only licks her paws after eating her meals and that seems to be just from habit. She loves the taste of them and she will not start eating her meals until we give her the "treat" first. I have this product on Amazon's subscribe and save and we will continue to purchase this product to keep her from being itchy.
customer_reviews.author: Bulldogz

customer_reviews.title: Great Replacement for Apoquel
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old Pittie mix was on Apoquel for a few years when he started getting little lumps/cysts on various parts of his body. After doing some research, I found this is a known side effect of long-term use of Apoquel, the widely popular and over-prescribed drug for canine allergies (among other, more serious side effects). I'm thrilled to have found this more natural solution that works BETTER than the Apoquel ever did. My boy's allergies are non-existent after starting these Aller-Immune Bites w/Hemp along with local raw honey! His eyes have cleared up and even his fur looks and feels fabulous now. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: JackedUpRadar

customer_reviews.title: Big improvement in our dogs allergy symptoms.
customer_reviews.text: Our dog had so many issues with allergies. Constantly itching and scratching. She also sneezed a lot and had goopey eyes. Most of these allergy symptoms are practically gone. So did it take them away 100%? No, but so much better. At least she is not miserable and unable to sleep. We can all get a good nights sleep and she's a much happier dog and no more eye goop. Her skin and coat are so much improved. I feel these are a better alternative to the prescription offered by our vet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stops the sneezing, biting, digging etc. of allergies
customer_reviews.text: If you have a dog with seasonal allergies these are definitely for you! They are working wonderful for my dogs and truly make a difference! They ran out and my goodness the sneezing, digging until hair came out, biting until she bled, and then being absolutely miserable...I realized just how much these were truly helping my babies. It took about 1 maybe 2 weeks to get all the symptoms completely under control again but thanks to subscribe and save we won't run out again.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Williams

customer_reviews.title: allergies
customer_reviews.text: We have a king charles cavalier that has suffered from allergies his entire life. We spent lots of money on a allergy specialist that turned out to be useless. He only stops scratching and itching if he is on apoquel but unfortunately the vet will not give a prescription for continued use. I have searched for a product and after reading the reviews I decided to try. Our dog's scratching and redness had decreased by 70 percent within 1-2 weeks, I highly recommend you give this product a try.
customer_reviews.author: lori fields

customer_reviews.title: Working pretty well so far
customer_reviews.text: I think these help our dogs allergies in the winter so far. Do according to instructions and work up to the number for your weight dog and give after meals. It was hard on my goldens stomach for the first dose. We are on our second jar. If we miss a day she starts over licking her feet for itches. The pills we were giving had gotten so expensive I wanted to try this. So far so good. She thinks they are treats and likes them.
customer_reviews.author: oklbtsk

customer_reviews.title: Vomiting & Diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: perfect if you want bright yellow stains on your carpet from vomit and your pet to have runny stool for a couple days now... i though the first incident might have been a coincidence but it was definitely caused by this. The color is impossible to get out of the carpet! :( I know it might take more than a week to work, but so far it is NOT GOOD!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended by two canine allergy sufferers
customer_reviews.text: Both of my dogs have seasonal allergy issues... one itches all the time, the other gets badly inflamed paws and runny eyes. I started using these bites because I’m leery of long-term use of Rx meds, especially the immunosuppressant ones. These really seem to help keep the allergies tolerable enough that I don’t have to resort to medication, which I genuinely appreciate. Plus the dogs love them as treats, so they’re super-easy to give. Highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: North Coast Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Life-Savers!!
customer_reviews.text: These things are fabulous!! My dog loves them, I put one in with his dinner every night and he eats it instantly. We’re not sure what he’s allergic to, whatever it is though, it makes him incredibly itchy- and medicine doesn’t seem to help him (we’ve been to the vet, tried everything!). We started giving these to him, and about a month later there was considerable improvement! And it wasn’t just timing, we ran out for a couple of weeks, and there was a night and day difference. These help keep his allergy under control, and they’ve also helped his dandruff decrease and coat to become nice and shiny. We’ll definitely keep buying them!! Worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Singh

customer_reviews.title: It works but give it time
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptic about this about this product. My dog has seasonal allergies and she was ripping out her fur. Went to the vet $400 later still had problem. I was looking for omega oil because I read it does help which how I found this product. About 2 1/2 - 3 weeks after taking this chew I noticed her paws were not red/ inflamed anymore and hair has started to grow back. She is still licking her paws but not inflamed or chewing it. I chose the the Hemp aller-immune because customers said they had problems with dogs eating the orange container version of aller- immune. She likes the hemp ones and takes as a treat.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: A WASTE OF TIME AND MONEY
customer_reviews.text: These didn't work for my dog at all! She hated them, so I had to mix with her food. But they didn't solve any problems with itching, licking, etc. - not even a little bit. Waste of money, but most of all, waste of time. I should have purchased something else that would have worked and given my dog some relief weeks ago.
customer_reviews.author: Tsali

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second bottle. We have 2 small Aussies and live in the dessert. The dry, dusty air gives our dogs allergy issues such as watery eyes. We find Zesty Paws Allergy Chews really help. One of our dogs is super picky and won’t eat anything, yet he loves these chews. Funny, they line up each morning waiting for their chew! We will continue to purchase these and recommend them to our friends.
customer_reviews.author: Koreame

customer_reviews.title: No harsh allergy meds this year
customer_reviews.text: Started this product a couple months ago and gave avoided using harsh immune suppressant meds for both my dogs seasonal allergies. Usually they can't leave their paws alone and get raw red enflamed skin if not put on harsh meds by july/aug. Here we are at the end of sept with only slight pink feet but not bald/infected or medicated. I will note, I've also added ground ginger powder to their food to help them out as well. Overthe counter allergy meds did nothing at the beginning of "allergy season", which is why we moved on to a supplement before hitting the vets office
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Give it a try and see the difference it makes!
customer_reviews.text: It’s been working so far! They eat it with no problem, I don’t have to force it on them, instead they look forward to having it each morning! Both my pups have been having really bad allergies this season (wheezing, sneezing, coughing, watery eyes, itchy, etc) and we do have prescribed meds but I don’t want to medicate them all the time, so with this supplement I have hardly have to give them their Benadryl and their symptoms have gone down drastically enough to say that these are making a difference in their comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy H.

customer_reviews.title: NO go! Non-effective, hate the taste & broke out in a rash!
customer_reviews.text: Although I like a couple of the Zesty Paws products (probiotics Pumpkin flavor👍 for one), this one is a NO for our Boyz! They hate the flavor, won't eat them without major encouraging & one of my boys broke out in a rash after giving this for 2 weeks!! Now I'm out $30.00!!!!!! NOT happy about that as an almost full container sits in my cabinet taking up space for $30.00!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: It help with my dog’s seasonal allergy!
customer_reviews.text: This supplement is really working for my dog’s allergy that affecting his left eye. His eyelid was red and swollen (he’s been pawing and brushed it against our rug after every walks), he had seizure history so I don’t want to give him inflammatory medicines. We have try this supplement for a week now and his swollen has noticeably down and the redness is gone. He didn’t want to take it by mouth, i have to crush it and mix with silver water to make a paste like consistency and add a drop of fish oil.
customer_reviews.author: Loucee

customer_reviews.title: Dogs like it
customer_reviews.text: Having used this product for several years now, my two dogs who were always chewing on their feet or different spots on their body, have not had any problems. I found this works as well as the prescription medicine that they were given by their veterinarian. Two major advantages - I do not have to get fight the dogs to swallow them as I do their pills - they are much cheaper than the medicine prescribed by the vet. After their morning trip outside, they come back into the house and sit by the counter until they are given this 'treat.'
customer_reviews.author: Larry182

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my Westie, Dixie
customer_reviews.text: My Westie has allergies especially to fleas. Even though my Westie and Dorkie are on flea medicine, here in Texas, fleas are still a problem. I bought Allergy Immune Supplements as a booster to their regime. Good food and good supplements. They have been on 5 in 1 and 8 in 1 with good results. I have to break these allergy supplements in half and cover it with cheese because my dogs know these are not their usual flavor. Despite having to do this I will continue to buy them. I’ve seen improvement and I trust Zesty Paws products to do the job stated on the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Judy S.

customer_reviews.title: Possibly a replacement for Apoquil -- I am hopeful
customer_reviews.text: My pom chi has been taking one of these a day for ten days now. The dark circles under his eyes are greatly decreased (less discharge -- though I still clean his eyes daily with a warm cloth), AND he is less 'barky' and a bit calmer overall. I also see that he is not licking his paws, but it is not the height of allergy season yet; we will see if this does the trick as summer approaches. Usually he starts having skin issues in July/August and we end up at the vet on Apoquil. I will update this.
customer_reviews.author: AAA

customer_reviews.title: She Loves It and It Works!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent supplement full of natural ingredients. Our Yorkies (2), Lab mix, Retriever mix, and 90lb Doberman love them. Our Doberman has an autoimmune disorder that really acts up in the summer. Cracked paws and itchy coat that only prednisone prescribed by the vet relieves. However this product has relieved her night time itching. I think she knows bc she won’t go to her bed at night without her dose.
customer_reviews.author: Terrie T

customer_reviews.title: This was the miracle product!
customer_reviews.text: I recently discovered my dog has bad seasonal allergies to what I think is grass pollen. I got her antibiotics 3 times, an allergy shot and like it all kind of worked. Bought these and have been using them for a week and she has drastically reduced the itching! It’s such a relief. I don’t know if it has completely fixed the problem but it has significantly helped! Her paws used to be warm and now they are completely normal and we spend lots of time outdoors! Give it shot and hope it works for your fur baby!
customer_reviews.author: caroline loudermilk

customer_reviews.title: So, so but really hard to tell...
customer_reviews.text: My dog doesn't like them. I have to disguise them in chicken salad in order for him to eat them. However, for as expensive as they are, I will continue to use them as his eye has cleared up and the skin issues are better after only a few days. So, when I know better of the results, I will update.
customer_reviews.author: PalmettoTreeSC

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PRODUCT & CUSTOMER SERVICE!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! Both of my dogs suffer from unknown allergies and itchy skin. They look forward to their pills AKA "treats," so that's a bonus! Their scratching has subsided and their coats look much more healthy. So glad this worked because the alternative was going back to the vet for allergy testing and potentially shots or a prescription which would have been costly. Last but not least, customer service is beyond incredible! They stand behind their product! Couldn't be more satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M. Sone

customer_reviews.title: Ok but the doggies prefer the orange container.
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchase the regular Allergy Immune supplement in lamb flavor. The dogs drooled o much they had bubbles coming out of their mouths when that saw the container each morning! They loved them! I decided to try this one and one dog ate them and the other was totally unimpressed. Maybe cheese flavored wasn’t a good idea. Oh well, live and learn! Back to the old kind next time around. I just hope my little guy keeps eating them and my old man will tough it out till we run out. I think it is helping but need more time to be sure....
customer_reviews.author: C. Fordham

customer_reviews.title: My Standard Poodle loves these
customer_reviews.text: My Standard Poodle loves these, I just put two in with her food and she eats them right down. She has allergies to trees and different grasses so I am hoping that these help, she has only been taking them for a week. I like that they have hemp and so many other good things in them. I have purchased other things from the Zesty Paws line before and think they are quality products
customer_reviews.author: B. Koehn

customer_reviews.title: Sure seems to help!
customer_reviews.text: We give this to our senior Pekingese who was going crazy from his allergies this spring. He wasn't fond of it at first so we did have to get a shot from the vet but that has worn off by now so we believe that these bites are what is working for him now. Jethro is a very fussy eater but we kept trying these in with his food every few days and now he is fine with them.
customer_reviews.author: bunnylady

customer_reviews.title: My dogs’ fave
customer_reviews.text: Both of my dogs LOVE these, preferring them over their regular treats. Our younger dog was in bad shape when we adopted him from the shelter, so we supplemented his diet with these to give him an extra boost. (He has itchy skin the vet found no clear reason for.) He’s now an active, healthy nearly full-grown dog with no more skin issues. Our other dog is an 8-year-old Schnauzer mix, so naturally prone to skin issues. He’s had none since starting him in this.
customer_reviews.author: L-squared

customer_reviews.title: Dog would not eat
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd product from this company I bought (others were for calming and one for omega-3 supplement). I have not had any luck with my dogs eating these items, but especially this one. Mine is also on Apoquel so I was hoping this would be a replacement. Taste and smell were unappealing to both of my dogs who are otherwise voracious eaters.
customer_reviews.author: J W

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We are 2 weeks in, with 3 normally itchy, anxious, and smelly babies. 1 of the 3 had a horrible issues with his ears which is what sent me on the hunt for better alternatives to expensive vet Bills and pills that do more harm than good. not only are we super pleased with the allergic reactions calming down, ear troubles subsided, and overall calmer and happier furbabies! We wish we could set up on subscriptions so we never risk running out. Thank you for a quality supplement that really works!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Martin

customer_reviews.title: Be concerned
customer_reviews.text: They made my 20 pound dog sick (soupy #2 everywhere). I kept making the amount smaller and smaller until it was just a tiny pinch, but at that amount what’s the point. I am afraid to give them away in case they makes a friends pet sick as well.
customer_reviews.author: RacerXXX

customer_reviews.title: No noticeable benefits for our dogs.
customer_reviews.text: 2 of the 3 dogs spit these out. We purchased them for our older shepherd who suffers from arthritis and severe allergies. I was hoping it would also help our other dog with anxiety
customer_reviews.author: E.E.

customer_reviews.title: Yummy treats
customer_reviews.text: I saw these treats and I was very excited to try them. My dog does tend to mess with his paws in the spring/summer. I try and do my best to wipe his paws and help his licking. Since he is a large dog, he does need to take three a day so I would go through them faster than some people. He would get excited when he saw me with the bag and would eat them right away. I can’t wait to see the results.
customer_reviews.author: Megan R Adams

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product-10/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: These pills have worked wonders for my six year old black lab, Jack. He was incessantly licking his paws (to the point he was getting raw sores on them) and my vet actually recommended a combination of Benadryl and these Zesty Paws Allergy immune supplements. Jack LOVES the flavor (they’re more of a treat than anything) and within a week, his allergies cleared up drastically. The natural hemp helps give a calming effect as well which helps with his anxiety. 10/10, would 100% recommend these to anyone with an allergy prone pup!
customer_reviews.author: A. Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Yes, they really work!!!
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off by saying... these work great!! My dogs also love them, one is a little picky about chewing it (I’m guessing flavor/scent) and will swallow it whole sometimes so I just break it in half for her. I have two mini Australian Shepherds living in CA and both get decently bad allergies (wheezing). Within a day or two of use of these, I noticed a huge improvement with both of my dogs and they no longer experience allergy issues thanks to these great allergy immune supplements!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Kunzer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be helping
customer_reviews.text: My dog is halfway through his first bottle and I believe it’s starting to make a difference. He has always suffered from seasonal allergies which presented as sneezing, rubbing his nose on the carpet often like it was itchy, and red eyes. His eyes are much less red now and I have noticed a lessening of the other symptoms as well. He eats the treat without issue which is great because he is very picky with his food, including treats! He seems to enjoy the other supplement from this company’s flavor a little more (bacon) but has never refused either treat. Overall I’m happy so far!
customer_reviews.author: Krista M. Chelf

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: My mini dachshund loves these treats and she has just about stopped licking her paws! I was skeptical at first, but they really seem to be helping her so I’m thankful for that. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Restaurant Guy

customer_reviews.title: Tasty, but no relief for allergies
customer_reviews.text: My dog loved the supplements and had no trouble taking them, but unfortunately they were not helpful. She has allergies, which includes chronic ear infections. I tried this product because there were good reviews about how it helped a lot of dogs. I'm glad for them, but it didn't help mine. There was no noticable improvement in her condition in regards to allergies.
customer_reviews.author: VeganRae

customer_reviews.title: Great for our pup and senior
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs are both breeds that are prone to skin allergies. One is a 7-month old Bull Terrier, the other an 11-year-old Doberman, this has improved born of their skin issues and helped curb the puppies corogaphobia. No special tricks to get our dogs to say these either, they think they're treats! Would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Alan Lukens

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE THESE 💟
customer_reviews.text: We Absolutely love these treats. Our Dogs especially love them. They make a big difference in the dogs allergies. Without these they sneeze alll the time, their little eye's water .... Its pitiful. We live in TN so allergies are very real. We give our dogs one a day (They are only 11lbs) an it makes a Major Impact on them.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: No more “itchies”!
customer_reviews.text: I got this product for immune support and to stop the “itchies”! I’ve tried other remedies including changing food, shampoos, sprays ointments other vitamins but she still itches to the point of making sores. Within 2 weeks on Zesty paws no more scratching! My pup can finally relax and be comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: IMPhoto

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great for my Girl!
customer_reviews.text: These chews worked great for my girl! She has pretty bad allergies to pretty much everything and frequently gets bacterial infections from itching as well as anal gland issues which only increases the itching. Just recently she developed a new rash of an unknown allergy and still can't figure it out to this day. With these chews I noticed a decrease in inflammation. My only negative comment is that the 10ct didn't seem to be enough chews to make a noticeable difference given that she eats about 2 a day with her weight. Hoping the larger count will continue to show improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hopeful results
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Labrador Retriever, MAC who has weepy eye during these terrible pollen and allergy seasons. I’m in Florida so they can be pretty brutal. After two weeks of taking them, we are starting to se some results. Less discharge from his eyes, and a bit less scratching at his ear. I’m very hopeful that these will continue to work, as I have had great success with the Zesty Paws brand. They make great products for our best buddies!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: They seem to make a slight difference
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these. I am giving 4 stars because I did not see a huge difference in her scratching, but there was a difference, which is something for sure! Her allergies were so severe that we ended up having to switch her to an actual allergy medication twice daily, but these would likely work for mild allergies
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Good for cats too
customer_reviews.text: These treats are fairly easy give. The turmeric made my pups hedge a bit, but they took them. I break the treats into pieces for my cat too. After dousing it with moist cat food, he ate it. He has year round breathing issues and I could hear a noticeable difference in his ability to breath when taking the treats.
customer_reviews.author: Wienerdogz

customer_reviews.title: Great product, worked well, dog loved them!
customer_reviews.text: The product worked really well. It took about 2 weeks I would say to fully build up in my dogs system and around that time I did start to see good results. She had a hot spot on her foot that she kept licking open and would not let fully heal and with the help of the aller-immune bites she did finally fully heal the hot spot. She loved the flavor and had no issues with taking them.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle P.

customer_reviews.title: WARNING!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my dog after just the first morning of this. I thought she was going to die. Had to take her to the emergency vet. Couldn’t walk and rocked back and forth. Luckily after it was out of her system she was fine but it was so scary. I can’t believe they sell this for dogs. DO NOT BUY!! I have used some of their other products and they were fine but this was not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog sick
customer_reviews.text: I gave my chihuahua 1/3 of a piece & she vomited it up everywhere. I did some research on the ingredients & vitamin A makes dogs sick.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: My dog had an allergic reaction to something in this supplement within 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: My 13 pound Chihuahua had a allergic reaction after 15 minutes of eating the first one. Not sure what on the label it could be but thankfully a Benydryl took care of the reaction within the hour. We are returning the item for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: William Melfi

customer_reviews.title: does nothing for my dog
customer_reviews.text: I started my dog on this Zesty Paws Allergy Immune Supplement with Hemp for Dogs - for Skin & Sinus + Seasonal Pollen (cheese flavor) loved the flavor this time, but it made his already bad anxiety worst, I sent back the first one because of the flavor (Peanut butter), they would not even touch it.
customer_reviews.author: Charles B.

customer_reviews.title: A great find for my doggie
customer_reviews.text: My dog is little and seemed to continually scratch and itch and his eyes watered a lot I got this product and noticed a big difference in the itching and his eyes look a lot better Will continue to buy this for my dog
customer_reviews.author: marianne

customer_reviews.title: They work as described!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the effectiveness for treating seasonal allergies. The female of my two 7 yr old sibling dachshunds would rub her itchy nose raw rubbing it on the carpet, grass, bedding or just about anything she could find to scratch the itch. I saw great improvement in two weeks. My male started getting frequent flare ups of rashes on his tummy and especially in his armpits this past year. We saw lasting improvement as opposed to several trips to the vet for steroids which only produced short term improvement before flaring up again. This pair only takes pills if hidden in soft cheese or liver sausage spread.....but not these bites. They mistake them for a treat!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Great product great company worth a try
customer_reviews.text: The bites and company are great. I bought these during a promotion they had buy one get one free. They emailed to ask how my dog liked them and I told them he liked them but the other bites for joint pain worked better for my dog. Instead of sending a second jar of these bites they sent the ones I preferred witch are more money than these. They did great and have a great product.
customer_reviews.author: T.J.

customer_reviews.title: Works for my boi
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old puppy boi has bad allergies. He will sneeze nonstop. His eyes will be watery in no time. He will scratch his face and his ear. Until I bought this zesty paws and it really works! No more scratching. No more watery eyes. He loves it like a treat 😌
customer_reviews.author: Lanie Biehl

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves them!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I discovered this line of pet products. For so long I tried other supplements and vitamins only to have to hide them in other foods so my dogs would eat them. This line is great in that my boys think they're treats and they eat them right down, no issues ever! =)
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: They were sold out for a while; I got 2 this time!
customer_reviews.text: My dog can't have salmon so finding anything to help with his seasonal allergies is extremely difficult. Enter these hemp things. Don't upset his stomach, don't make his itching worse, help with paw licking & sneezing & etc, & he seems to like the flavor fine.
customer_reviews.author: IvyPhoenix

customer_reviews.title: No more scratching!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to help my lab with his scratching. After about a week I saw a significant difference. He loves them...never a problem when I tell him he's getting a cookie! They are so good my other dog gets one just because she thinks she should. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Sue

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these treats and they seem to really help reduce his flair ups. He's also on an injection he gets from the doctor that he gets every 1-2 months. Except since being on these he needs it about every 3 months. This is nice because these chews are $30 or so and his injection is about $120
customer_reviews.author: Zack S

customer_reviews.title: One dog loves the, one dog won't eat them.
customer_reviews.text: One of my dogs loves them and the other won't eat them after several tries. I like the ingredients but maybe the flavor could be improved? They are not picky dogs and usually eat everything. I can't say much for the benefits as this small of an amount is not enough to find that out. I would consider buying again.
customer_reviews.author: vbooky

customer_reviews.title: My dog says no thanks
customer_reviews.text: She wouldn't eat these. Broke them up and she still goes around them in her bowl. Can't really comment on whether they work considering she doesn't really eat wet food but dry. They are soft and rather powdery when you break them apart so perhaps the hemp fiber just isn't for her.
customer_reviews.author: AR Diamond

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: So far my pup is only on day 2 of supplements but he ALWAYS gets VERY EXCITED when I go to grab for them so flavor is definitely not an issue. They are a little pricey but if they work well for my puppy then they're definitely be worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Rob

customer_reviews.title: Worked great as part of an anti-allergy plan for our dog!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using these for our two muttlies for the past week and have seen a big change for the better! One of our dogs is prone to skin allergies and spends a lot of time itching and licking. We added these treats to our allergy fighting routine (he gets Benadryl twice a day and has a topical spray for hotspots) and noticed a significant reduction in licking and scratching behaviors! He was able to relax and chew his favorite toys and race around the yard. He seemed calmer and just more comfortable overall. I am happy to add this product to our arsenal and will continue to use them!
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Radford

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t help with allergies at all, only made them worse.
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping this would help my dogs allergies. I spend lots of money on shots every month so was excited that we could possibly get away from expensive vet bills. These didn’t help at all and actually make it worse for her. She threw up with these and gave her terrible diarrhea.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than prescriptions for allergies
customer_reviews.text: Zesty Paws Aller-Immune bites helped get this guy off pricey prescription allergy medications for skin flare ups and yeast in his ears. It helped his fur grow back and his ears stay clean and not smelly. This is great stuff and I’ve started giving them to my other dog and it improved his coat.
customer_reviews.author: Connie F.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Our sweet Beagle is finally comfortable! She was diagnosed with a nasal parasite. After 8 months of determining diagnosis and treatment for her sneezing and coughing, she has rhinitis, and a dry continual cough. The vet couldn't offer much so I thought I'd try this, since it specifically stated for nose and throat. After only 24 hours, no more coughing or sneezing! I know she'll be taking this for the rest of her life, but at least she's going to be comfortable. Truely thankful.
customer_reviews.author: TKB

customer_reviews.title: It helps with skin issues.
customer_reviews.text: My American Pitbull Terrier has skin issues from allergies and I was hoping this would help. It resolved the majority of the issues, but not fully. She seemed happier once she had been taking them for awhile, so I was thinking maybe she was lacking something that was possibly making her not feel well. They smell a little weird, but she seems to love them. Overall I think the product is worth it, and I think I'm going to continue giving these to my dog!
customer_reviews.author: Nikita David

customer_reviews.title: Great for watery eyes and runny noses!
customer_reviews.text: My dog gets itchy watery eyes and a runny nose from allergies instead of itchy skin. These are the first allergy aid I’ve found that included sinuses in areas of treatment. It’s definitely made an improvement in how runny his nose and eyes are and the itch too. Not completely gone, but definitely better! He loves the taste too.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I gave my dog the lamb favored ones and he loves them. The hemp ones on the other hand he will not touch. Gave the hemp ones to a friend and their dog was throwing up for it after a few days of taking. If you want to try it, go for the lamb flavor not hemp. Noticed minor improvements in dog's allergies.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: This actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product because of so many positive reviews. I have to say I am very pleasantly surprised that this one-a- day has actually worked, where steroids just took off the edge and no more. My dog likes them as a treat so they are easy to get him to eat and his scratching and hot spots have been reduced significantly. It's really amazing! It has been about 4 weeks since he started taking them. I didn't see any difference until about 2 weeks in. I am so happy to have a natural product for him. Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Bronwyn Jenkins-Deas

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I have given these to my dogs for about 4 months now, and the dogs love them, and seem to help with scratching issues. My dogs line up every morning just to get their treat, (they don't know it helps them). Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: D. Howell

customer_reviews.title: He is an itching but didn’t help the sinus
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this because it dealt with the sinuses I am not seeing that much improvement after three weeks and now the dog doesn’t like the taste of them. He isn’t itching so that part was good that’s why I gave it a three
customer_reviews.author: Ronda Courtney

customer_reviews.title: My dog won't eat it.
customer_reviews.text: My dog tried the orange version of the same product with no issues, but this is cheese flavored and my dog spit it out. I even tried to wrap cheese around it and he ate the cheese and spit out the supplement. $29 down the drain. Don't get it. I'm sure it works great, but if your dog doesn't like it you will never know.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Corey

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My two bulldogs love this product! Everyone knows bulldogs are know for skin issues but these daily allergies chews are super helpful!! Plus my dogs can’t wait for them each day and almost swallow them whole with excitement.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love them!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the peanut butter allergy chews for over a year and have had great success. When I saw this product including hemp oil, I had to try it. My dogs have never been so excited for their daily 'treats'!! They seem nice and fresh and I am glad I found another product from Zesty paws to keep my pups happy and healthy!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: MIraculous product
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing product. My dogs live on a ranch and the ground is rough. In the summer their paws get cracked and sore. They lick their paws, which makes it worse. Since I have used the Zesty Paws Allergy Immune Bites with Hemp, Their paws have healed and no more licking. They have a sheen on their coats and their energy levels have increased. This product is truly miraculous and I love it. My 10 years old Aussie went from limping badly to racing around the place. I noticed a difference after the first week of using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Frustrated in California

customer_reviews.title: Great Allergy Relief for My Senior Dogs
customer_reviews.text: My senior dogs get various allergy symptoms. This product has given them relief from sneezing, itchy eyes (that they like to rub on me!), and lying on their backs and doing the twist. Best of all, they think it's a treat, and gobble it right away!
customer_reviews.author: Jaired

customer_reviews.title: Aller-Immune Bites stops the scratching!
customer_reviews.text: My toy poodle has allergies which causes him to scratch, lick his feet and even caused him to have ear infections. Since he started on Aller-immune Bites, he rarely scratches, the paw licking had reduced to only about 10% and he has had no more ear infections. The bites are easy to give to my dog and he loves them. I highly recommend Aller-Immune Bites.
customer_reviews.author: Susan McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: My bulldog was having bad allergies here in Texas so we gave these a shot. They worked really well but he wasn’t a fan of the taste. Normally he will eat anything but he had to force him to eat these. Overall they got the job done
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: This has helped with my dogs skin allergies
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this to my dog due to him scratching all the time due to allergies, I have only given him this product for 10 days and it seems to be giving him some relief but I am going to continue and hope it helps him get total relief.
customer_reviews.author: Rab

customer_reviews.title: All my dogs like it
customer_reviews.text: I only give them small portions (they're all small dogs) and mainly on days pollen is out full force. Seems to work well for them and it calms my middle doggo who tends to get anxious easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: They work!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our rat terrier has skin allergies that flare up during warm weather. He itches so much that he'll scratch until he's raw. He's been taking these year round. Since warmer months began, his skin allergies are at least 80% better than they've ever been. When he has a flare up, we can manage it with topical treatment (which has never happened before!). We'll continue use as long as it's available!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Quiet the licking !
customer_reviews.text: My Big Baby and my lil Baby have gotten relief from the itching and licking. I know they feel so much better . Hair Shedding has improved by going no grain and using these . Very thankful I found and try them .
customer_reviews.author: Joy Bebber

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: All 3 of my dogs love waking up to these every morning. These have been a life safer for their seasonal allergies, No more red eyes, scratching, sniffing and sneezing.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer K

customer_reviews.title: Good for dogs health support
customer_reviews.text: I do believe this is helping my Min Pin tootsie. She has seizures and horrible allergies it seems to stress her. This helps keep her strong and also helps her tummy/gas issues. Thanks Zesty 🐾’s !!!
customer_reviews.author: Agnes Prassas

customer_reviews.title: Works great on hair loss due to allergies.
customer_reviews.text: My dog has terrible allergies and started losing her hair. I figured I would try this because the reviews seemed good and I’m glad I did. She absolutely loves these “treats” and her hair has completely grown back. She is no longer itching or scratching all the time and doesn’t seem as aggravated as she was. I’m definitely going to continue to use, and have already recommended this product to others whose dogs are having similar issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jls1186

customer_reviews.title: Zesty Paws
customer_reviews.text: I admit I was doubtful, but ordered this after reading others' reviews. This supplement truly did help my dog with her allergies on her paws and incessant licking! I ordered a second supply! Works well!
customer_reviews.author: Teresita Pines

customer_reviews.title: Hair saver
customer_reviews.text: This is the second jar my dog has been on. He normally tears his Fur out and has the worst allergies. I usually have to give him several medications throughout the day, but since trying this product that’s all He needs😃
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Zesty Allergy snacks
customer_reviews.text: My Dog loves these and he is picky on what he eats. He loves the taste. He has no idea they are good for him! Also, my dogs allergies have gone away!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila A

customer_reviews.title: Takes a few weeks be patient
customer_reviews.text: My Charlie has major allergy issues and with numerous trips to the vet and empty bank accounts I decided to give this product a try. Currently my Charlie has been on this product for just over 3 weeks and has greatly reduced his itching and he actually is keeping is hair where normally by this time of year he has it rubbed off his chin and nose. Most reviews I have read says it takes a few weeks so I am hoping this takes place of the expensive trips to the vet.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Pup likes them!
customer_reviews.text: My pup likes the flavor of these and I love they can support her durring allergy season. She gets itchy paws and occasional hives so im looking forward to seeing if these help her environmental reactions tone down long term.
customer_reviews.author: Mel07

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it and it helps her so much!
customer_reviews.text: My girl loves these! I've tried the regular ones without the hemp as well. I've noticed a huge difference in her skin. I feel bad giving her benadryl all the time, but with this I haven't really had to give her any. She gets so excited when I go to put it in her dog bowl with her food. Its the first thing she eats!
customer_reviews.author: Cathleen Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Helped my dog!
customer_reviews.text: My dog has terrible allergies! We have tried so many things but are really trying not to resort to prescription drugs. At first I wasn’t seeing much of a difference after taking these but after a few weeks she is definitely less itchy. Are these a miracle cure? No. But she is definitely better and we will for sure purchase another!
customer_reviews.author: Laulie Eckeberger

customer_reviews.title: No more sneezing and itching!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my chihuahua puppy who would wake up with sneeze attacks and was constantly itchy. He’s been having one of these treats per day for about three weeks now and the sneezing and itching has stopped! I was worried he would have trouble eating them because of the size but they break apart easily and have been no problem. Plus he loves the taste. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey B.

customer_reviews.title: Hates them
customer_reviews.text: My oldest won’t touch these even when I wrap in cheese (which takes a lot of cheese since they are kind of large). Have to see if it’s to late to return. I had gotten the salmon flavor allerimmune chews which she ate fine but they didn’t seem to do much for her itching. I’ve just ordered some of their other products so we will see with those how they like them and if they seem to work. Not totally giving up yet!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dogs LOVE these!!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 dogs absolutely LOVED these!! I got them for my Labs seasonal allergies, and he improved A LOT while he was on these! Easy to give, dogs love them, AND they work! Recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Jo Foster

product_meta.title: Zesty Paws Allergy Immune Supplement with Hemp for Dogs - for Skin & Sinus + Seasonal Pollen Dog Allergies - with Cod Liver Fish Oil, Curcumin, BioPerine, Vitamin C & Quercetin - Omega 3 & 6 Support
product_meta.description: Size:90 CountZesty Paws Hemp Allergy Immune Bites are premium hemp-enhanced soft chew supplements that feature Qmin+ Curcumin, Wellmune for Pets, BioPerine, and a blend of natural ingredients and vitamins that may promote a healthy response to seasonal, skin, and environmental allergies. It's a delicious treat that may help dogs constantly scratching itchy skin from allergies, while also providing support for hot spots. This nature inspired formula may also help dogs that deal with allergies on the nose, ears, eyes, and sinus, along with supporting immune function from the Omega fatty acids, Vitamin C antioxidants, and other beneficial ingredients in every chew. Whether your dog is a puppy, adult, or senior, this formula benefits immune system and the body's response to allergies for all ages, breeds, and sizes.
feature_bullets: ALLERGY & IMMUNE SUPPORT - Hemp Allergy Immune Bites contain nourishing natural and organic ingredients that may help dogs with skin itching, hot spots, seasonal allergies, and canine digestive activity.

HOLISTIC HEMP ENHANCED BLEND - These cheese flavored treats include Organic Hemp Seed Oil and Powder, which provides a 3:1 ratio of Omega 3 and 6 fatty acids for skin, coat, and immune system support.

PREMIUM INGREDIENTS - Each chew features Qmin+ Turmeric Curcumin (95% Curcuminoids) and Wellmune for Pets (beta glucan) for advanced digestive and immune support, and BioPerine for nutrient absorption.

SUPREME ALLERGY SUPPORT - This formula includes Hemp, Cod Liver Fish Oil, and Butterbur Extract for anti itch skin care and hot spots, plus seasonal and pollen related eye, ear, nasal and sinus allergies

PROMOTES IMMUNE HEALTH - This blend of antioxidant Vitamin C, Taurine, Quercetin, and Bromelain Digestive Enzymes supports immune system response and healthy gut flora to help your pet feel their best.
